alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 23 at 3:21PM MST until August 23 at 3:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 345 PM MST. * At 321 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Round Valley to Sugarloaf Mountain to near Saguaro Lake, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mesa, Scottsdale, Fountain Hills, Sugarloaf Mountain, Ballantine Trailhead, Granite Reef Dam, McDowell Mountain Park, Usery Mountain Park, Saguaro Lake, Canyon Lake, Goldfield Ranch, Desert Mountain, Camp Creek, Salt River Tubing Recreation Area and Rio Verde. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 87 between mile markers 186 and 211. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 23 and 25. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
